channel.title: ggplot2 on Skagit Life

item.title: Lets make a Sankey!
item.description: In many ways1, I am a simple man. If I see an opportunity to make a Sankey, I get my Sankey on. Here’s the plan2. The Plan (explain plan here)3 Implementation Ok, now to jump in and start coding! library(ggplot2) #priorities library(tidyverse) library(ggthemes) #library(instaR) #devtools::install_github("pablobarbera/instaR/instaR") I tried horsing around for a bit trying to get an access token for Instagram’s API, but there were too many words on the facebook developers page.
